column4: hello i dont know were else to turn but i think i have a keylogger that is installed in the bios how would i go about getting rid of it i have a windows /ubuntu 11.10 set up
if it's really in the BIOS, which is more than just unlikely, downright impossible, then it's a hardware question. please go to ##hardware
you are wrong about what you heard
you most probably have a windows malware which stole your login credentials.you are OT here unless you have an actual ubuntu problem. please ask elsewhere about your malware
